extensions.name: AP_PieMenus
extensions.description:
Speed up your workflow with these frequently-used Harmony tools arranged into six themed pie menus: Animation, Node View, Selection, Painting, Effects and Timeline (NEW!). Each pie contains eight commonly used tools, for a total of 48!

How to Use

You'll need the following three extensions installed:
  1. openHarmony - 0.2.8 is required for pie menus to work
  2. AP_PieMenus - that's why we're here
  3. ScriptShortcuts - this adds a Pie Menu category in Harmony's Edit > Keyboard Shortcuts list

Now go to Edit > Keyboard Shortcuts and you should see a brand new Pie Menus category. Now you can set your brush tool keyboard shortcut [B] to bring up the entire Painting pie menu.

New Timeline Pie

New Timeline pie menu for fast playback and drawing exposure controls

1.0.3 changes

  • NEW! Timeline pie: playback, timeline nav, drawing exposure
  • NodeView: Removed Cable Cutter, added Enter + Exit groups + Duplicate selected node
  • Select: replaced Contour and Colour select with Delete and Copy
  • Paint: Replaced Dropper tool with Protect Colour
  • Animation: Changed Light Table to work in camera view

Thanks to Mathieu Chaptel for making the original piemenu framework!
extensions.author: Adam Phillips
